Installing¶

Quickplots will run on all versions of Python 3. Backporting to Python 2 may be done at a later date.

PyPI¶

Quickplots can be installed from PyPI. To install, use:

pip install quickplots

Dependencies¶

Quickplots has no third-party dependencies.

GitHub¶

The latest version of quickplots will always be available at GitHub, and can be cloned with:

git clone git://github.com/samirelanduk/quickplots.git
